about_the_game:
※All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 21.

– An unexplored world for just the two of you is here! -
The long-awaited new work from the producer of "VR Kanojo" is even more fun and cuter than ever!

--Introducing "VR-Kanojo"--

Experience the special moment everyone dreams of: your girlfriend visiting your room for the first time!

◆A thrilling, lifelike experience with the heroine Yuhi Sakura!

Share delightful moments with Sakura-chan by feeding her cake, watching a movie together, taking a bath, and more. This game is packed with fun situations you can enjoy together!

◆Experience the presence of your girlfriend only in VR.

Move your face closer or farther away to "look" at what you want to see. Reach out and "touch" what you want to touch. Feel the intuitive vibration of the controller!

This immersive VR experience allows you to look and touch, providing a unique interaction with Sakura-chan.

◆Perfect for VR beginners and seasoned gentlemen alike!

Even those new to VR can enjoy the world with simple operations, and you can communicate with your girlfriend while comfortably seated! Of course, you can also move freely and enjoy the 360-degree environment to the fullest, exploring and interacting in various ways!

Feel the presence of Sakura-chan, now even cuter with enhanced VR expression.

◆Scheduled for worldwide release on Steam in winter 2024!

Supported languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Korean (audio in Japanese only).

Get a special experience like never before with "VR-Kanojo"!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains scenes depicting sexual situations involving the male protagonist and a female character. All characters depicted are over the age of 20.

name: VR-Kanojo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200, 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 460, 4 GB or Intel Arc A380, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: 1080p Low @ 30 FPS w/ Balanced FSR 1.0, requires a CPU which supports the AVX and SSE4.2 instruction set
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700, 8 GB or Intel Arc A750, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: 1080p High @ 60 FPS w/o FSR, requires a CPU which supports the AVX and SSE4.2 instruction set
